video.title: Booze Traveler
video.synopsis: A Boston bartender travels to the far reaches of the globe, sampling seriously exotic alcoholic beverages and exploring local drinking customs.

episodes.synopsis: Although drinking in modern-day Turkey is highly restricted, intrepid Jack encounters a fiery blend of beer, rebellion, soccer, Islam and brandy.
episodes.title: Turkey Is Stirring

episodes.synopsis: From the lost city of Machu Picchu to the capital city of Lima, Jack experiences the magic of Peru and its drinks, like spit beer and frog smoothies.
episodes.title: Peru Is Magic

episodes.synopsis: In the country with more bars per capita than any other in Europe, Jack tries flaming moonshine and cool Vermouth, and enters a secret society.
episodes.title: Spain: Mixed, Not Blended

episodes.synopsis: In Austria, Jack experiences the medicinal properties of Zirbenschnapps (pinecone schnapps) and visits a spa featuring a healing bath of hops.
episodes.title: Austria Is Good for You

episodes.synopsis: Viking spirit gives Iceland a warmth that defies its Arctic locale, as Jack learns by trying moss schnapps, volcanic beer and a marathon pub crawl.
episodes.title: Iceland's Warm Fire

episodes.synopsis: At the base of the Khangai Mountains, Jack samples Mongolia's warrior nomad-derived beverages, including camel vodka and fermented horse milk.
episodes.title: Mongolian Road Trip

episodes.synopsis: Jack travels to the top of the world to sample a holy marijuana milkshake, Sherpa beer and a beverage regarded as the Yeti's favorite drink.
episodes.title: Nepal: A Higher State

episodes.synopsis: Ready for the unconventional, Jack bravely ventures into a wine bath, tries poison blowfish sake and drinks with Sumo wrestlers during a Japan trip.
episodes.title: Japan Uncorked

episodes.synopsis: Discovering that Lithuanian culture survived a half-century of Soviet oppression, a delighted Jack experiences beer with giants and pagan rituals.
episodes.title: Loopy Lithuania

episodes.synopsis: Fish pickle, barrels of Dutch Courage and a fortress full of rare beer are just a few highlights of Jack's voyage through the Netherlands.
episodes.title: Netherlands: Liquid Courage

episodes.synopsis: In the ancient land of Armenia, Jack discovers mulberry moonshine, wine grapes from Noah's Ark, a legendary brandy and evidence of human sacrifice.
episodes.title: The Armenian Trail

episodes.synopsis: It's the Day of the Dead in New Orleans, and Jack celebrates with liquor made from tobacco, voodoo room service and a secret Mardi Gras drink.
episodes.title: Dead in New Orleans

episodes.synopsis: Seaweed-rum smoothies and Mayan chocolate wine are some of the delicacies Jack imbibes while visiting the gorgeous beaches and lush jungles of Belize.
episodes.title: Belize: Paradise Found

episodes.synopsis: In a South African sojourn that begins with a hangover, Jack finds honey hooch, Zulu tribal beer, palm-tree wine and fruit that makes elephants drunk.
episodes.title: South Africa: Hidden Gems

episodes.synopsis: In the U.S. state synonymous with whiskey, Jack uncovers a surprising link between George Washington and moonshiners, and samples old-fashioned rum.
episodes.title: Tennessee: Red, White & Booze
